pullRequest.title: Log executable output2
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Edit to previous PR.  Move responsibility of logging executable output info to DetectExecutableRunner (IDETECT-1784)

commit.message: feat(detectable): log executable standard and error output if return code is non-zero (IDETECT-1784)

nodes.bodyText: Why do you have these imports? It seems like these lines were the only lines changed in this file.
Can we add a log before each output indicating whether or not the output is standard or error?

commit.message: fix(detectable): Added boolean flag in DetectExecutableRunner to dictate logging of output (IDETECT-1802)
fix(detectable): Added info log specifying Standard vs Error Output (IDETECT-1802)
fix(detectable): Added check to make sure logger not in Debug or Trace when logging executable output in DetectExecutableRunner (IDETECT-1802)
